titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Noblemen and gentlemen to return home while the king is in Scotland.
Dated at end: Worsop, the eight day of April, in the fifteenth yeere of our reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
